title: Petta Paraak Meaning
stanzas:
Here is meaning of Petta Paraak which is a theme song from Petta Movie and lyrics is written by Vivek, composed by Anirudh Ravichandar.
What is meaning of Paraak ?
Paraak means arriving / coming and it is mostly used in ancient times when king arrives/comes. Listen to below AV from Rajini's Movie Chandramukhi, he is King Vettaiyan and soldier's raise chorus describing the King which ends with word Paraak Paraak which meaning arriving/coming.

https://youtu.be/pm8cQt8HOec?t=254   (its telugu, couldn't find Tamil one)

(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
One More from Vaigai Puyal Vadivelu movie Imsai Arasan 23rd Pulikecei and its a famous comedy scene where a soldier misses a statement from a lengthy one. 

Raajathi raja, raaja maarthaanda 
raja gambeera , raaja kula thilaga 
raaja kulothunga ( missed one in the comedy scene) 
raaja paraakkirama, raaja vairaakkiya 
maamannar 23 am pulikesi 
paraak paraak paraak 
What Petta means ?
In Chennai, "Petta" means an area within a city or place formed by group of people or a person who owns the area there. In Petta movie Rajini name is "Petta Velan" where petta is prefix and he ruled particular area and famously known as "Petta".
